p: Garcinia gardneriana is very rich in secondary metabolites. Some phytochemical analyses have identified xanthones, steroids, triterpenes, and flavonoids in different parts of the plant [ 14, 41, 42, 43], which have been associated with pharmacological effects such as anti-inflammatory, antinociceptive, antibacterial, and antiparasitic activities [ 38, 58, 59, 60].
